i1.name: Determination
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Xin Zhao''' gains a ''Determination I'' and ''Determination II'' stack for every {{ai|Wind Becomes Lightning|Xin Zhao}} strike or basic attack {{tip|on-hit}}, up to a maximum of two.

At two ''Determination I'' stacks, '''Xin Zhao's''' next {{ai|Wind Becomes Lightning|Xin Zhao}} strike or basic attack {{tip|on-hit}} consumes the stacks to {{tip|heal}} him for {{pp|7 to 92}} {{as|(+ 10% AD)}} {{as|(+ 55% AP)}}.

At two ''Determination II'' stacks, '''Xin Zhao's''' next {{ai|Wind Becomes Lightning|Xin Zhao}} strike or basic attack {{tip|on-attack}} consumes the stacks to deal {{as|{{pp|15 to 45 for 4|key=%|1 to 16|formula=15% + 10% every 5 levels}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Xin Zhao gains a Determination I and Determination II stack for every Xin Zhao's Wind Becomes Lightning strike or basic attack on-hit, up to a maximum of two.
At two Determination I stacks, Xin Zhao's next Xin Zhao's Wind Becomes Lightning strike or basic attack on-hit consumes the stacks to heal him for 7 − 92 (based on level) (+ 10% AD) (+ 55% AP).
At two Determination II stacks, Xin Zhao's next Xin Zhao's Wind Becomes Lightning strike or basic attack on-attack consumes the stacks to deal 1 to 16 ‒ undefined AD bonus physical damage.
i1.notes:
* Stacks reset when '''Xin Zhao''' {{tip|death|dies}}.
* ''Determination II'' deals {{tip|proc damage}}.
** Since it is a separate instance of damage when applied by basic attack or either of {{ais|W|Xin Zhao}} strikes, {{tip|damage reduction|flat damage reduction}} that applies to both the main and bonus damage such as {{cais|Tantrum|Amumu}} passive will reduce each, for twice the reduction.
** The bonus damage cannot {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}}.
* When applied by a basic attack:
** The attack uses a unique animation.
** The bonus damage benefits from {{stil|life steal}}.
*** {{pending for test}} It {{tip|applies life steal}} specifically.
* When applied by either of {{ais|W|Xin Zhao}} strikes:
** Triggers against the closest target struck by the strike (equals first target to receive spell effects).
** Does not benefit from {{sti|life steal}}, including not healing from ''Wind Becomes Lightning's'' 33% conversion for this bonus damage.
** Since {{tip|proc damage}} is 'single target', {{tip|drain|Vamp}} will heal from 100% of the bonus damage.
* The ''Determination II'' stacks are not visible on the champion's buff bar in-game.
* Hitting one or more enemies with {{ais|Wind Becomes Lightning|Xin Zhao}} strikes generates one stack per strike.
* If {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} would trigger when the ''Determination II'' stacks are at maximum, the bonus stack will instead overstack, and be consumed on the next ''Determination II'' usage.
* Stacks of ''Determination'' will be gained even if the attack is {{tip|blocked}}.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Determination's'' interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|blind}}).

q1.name: Three_Talon_Strike
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Xin Zhao''' empowers his spear for 5 seconds, causing his next three basic attacks {{tip|on-attack}} to have an {{tip|uncancelable windup}}, deal {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and reduce his other [[Champion ability|abilities']] {{sti|cooldowns}} by 1 second each. The second attack will refresh ''Three Talon Strike's'' duration.
The third attack consumes the effect to {{tip|airborne|knock up}} the target for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
''Three Talon Strike'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Xin Zhao's''' basic attack timer and is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Xin Zhao empowers his spear for 5 seconds, causing his next three basic attacks on-attack to have an uncancelable windup, deal bonus physical damage and reduce his other Champion ability cooldowns by 1 second each. The second attack will refresh Three Talon Strike's duration.
The third attack consumes the effect to knock up the target for 0.75 seconds.
Three Talon Strike resets Xin Zhao's basic attack timer and is affected by critical strike modifiers.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|16 to 52}} {{as|(+ 40% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Bonus Damage|{{ap|16*3 to 52*3}} {{as|(+ 120% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will only block the third attack.
* The enhanced attacks present input buffering during their wind-up animation ('''Xin Zhao''' cannot be issued any commands until after it ends).

effects.str:
• Bonus Physical Damage: (+ 40% bonus AD)
  • Total Bonus Damage: (+ 120% bonus AD)

w1.name: Wind_Becomes_Lightning
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Xin Zhao''' uses his spear to slash in an arc and, after the cast time, unleashes a thrust in a line in the target direction. Each strike deals {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies hit, modified to {{pp|50 to 100 for 16|key=%}} against {{tip|minions}}, and the thrust's damage is increased by {{as|{{pp|key=%|key1=%|type=critical strike chance|0 to 33.3 for 11|0 to 100|formula=0.33%*critical strike chance}}|critical chance}}. Enemies hit by the thrust are also {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 50% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds and, if they are a champion or a monster, are ''{{ai|Challenge|Xin Zhao|Challenged}}'' and {{tip|standard sight|revealed}} for 3 seconds.

The durations of {{ai|Three Talon Strike|Xin Zhao}}, {{ais|Audacious Charge|Xin Zhao}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}, and {{ai|Crescent Guard|Xin Zhao}} are delayed relative to ''Wind Becomes Lightning's'' cast time after {{fd|0.2}} seconds of its activation.
''Wind Becomes Lightning's'' damage {{tip|healing|heals}} '''Xin Zhao''' for {{fd|33.{{recurring|3}}}}% of his {{stil|life steal}}.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Xin Zhao uses his spear to slash in an arc and, after the cast time, unleashes a thrust in a line in the target direction. Each strike deals physical damage to all enemies hit, modified to 50% − 100 for 16% (based on level) against minions, and the thrust's damage is increased by 0 to 100 ‒ undefined. Enemies hit by the thrust are also slowed by 50% for 1.5 seconds and, if they are a champion or a monster, are Xin Zhao's Challenged and revealed for 3 seconds.
The durations of Xin Zhao's Three Talon Strike, Xin Zhao's Audacious Charge bonus attack speed, and Xin Zhao's Crescent Guard are delayed relative to Wind Becomes Lightning's cast time after 0.2 seconds of its activation.
Wind Becomes Lightning's damage heals Xin Zhao for 33.Unknown value: recurring / 3% of his Unknown value: stil / life steal.

effects.str:
• Slash Damage: (+ 30% AD)
  • Thrust Damage: (+ 80% AD) (+ 50% AP)
  • Total Damage: (+ 110% AD) (+ 50% AP)

e1.name: Audacious_Charge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Xin Zhao''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target enemy's location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies around the primary target and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 30% for {{fd|0.5}} seconds. ''Audacious Charge's'' range is increased against ''{{ai|Challenge|Xin Zhao|Challenged}}'' targets.
'''Xin Zhao''' then gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 5 seconds.

'''Xin Zhao''' cannot cast {{ai|Wind Becomes Lightning|Xin Zhao}} while dashing, but he may still buffer it. {{ai|Three Talon Strike|Xin Zhao}} and {{ai|Crescent Guard|Xin Zhao}} can both be cast during the dash.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Xin Zhao dashes to the target enemy's location, dealing magic damage to all enemies around the primary target and slowing them by 30% for 0.5 seconds. Audacious Charge's range is increased against Xin Zhao's Challenged targets.
Xin Zhao then gains bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.
Xin Zhao cannot cast Xin Zhao's Wind Becomes Lightning while dashing, but he may still buffer it. Xin Zhao's Three Talon Strike and Xin Zhao's Crescent Guard can both be cast during the dash.
e1.notes:
* The primary target cannot dodge ''Audacious Charge's'' effects.
** The target will always emit the area of effect from their position.
* If no unit is targeted directly, ''Audacious Charge'' will search for possible targets in a 200 radius around the target location.

r1.name: Crescent_Guard
description: {{sbc|Passive - Challenge:}} The last enemy champion hit by '''Xin Zhao's''' [[basic attack]]s, {{ais|Wind Becomes Lightning|Xin Zhao}} thrust or {{ai|Audacious Charge|Xin Zhao}} is ''{{ai|Challenge|Xin Zhao|Challenged}}'' for 3 seconds.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Xin Zhao''' sweeps his spear around him, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all nearby enemies, capped at 600 against {{tip|monsters}}, and  {{tip|airborne|knocking back}} all non-''{{ai|Challenge|Xin Zhao|Challenged}}'' targets hit up-to 700 units over {{fd|0.75}} seconds, as well as {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for the same duration.
For the next 4 seconds, '''Xin Zhao''' is also {{tip|invulnerability|invulnerable}} to enemy {{tip|champion|champions}} more than 450-units away from him.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Passive - Challenge: The last enemy champion hit by Xin Zhao's basic attacks, Xin Zhao's Wind Becomes Lightning thrust or Xin Zhao's Audacious Charge is Xin Zhao's Challenged for 3 seconds.
Active: Xin Zhao sweeps his spear around him, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies, capped at 600 against monsters, and knocking back all non-Xin Zhao's Challenged targets hit up-to 700 units over 0.75 seconds, as well as stunning them for the same duration.
For the next 4 seconds, Xin Zhao is also invulnerable to enemy champions more than 450-units away from him.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|75 to 275}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 110% AP)}} {{as|(+ 15% of target's '''current''' health)}}}}

effects.str: • Physical Damage: (+ 100% bonus AD) (+ 110% AP) (+ 15% of target's current health)

st_slices: (+ 100% bonus AD) (+ 110% AP) (+ 15% of target's current health)
